note: Husband, father, Mac Admin, science enthusiast, friend to animals, part-time tokusatsu dinosaur, raging feminist. Fuck fascists, mysogynists, transphobes, racists, nazis and their ilk. Opinions are my own. Purveyor of fine dad jokes, and old enough to be narrator for tours of “what used to be here”. Flying buttress of justice. FuturePast signatory of the Declaration of Independence. Living on Lenape lands. Not as inflexible as I might appear. It’s ok to punch Nazis. He/Him.
